start.text: The unbeliever! You walk in darkness, blind to the truth! The Great One sees you!

choices.text: Your Great One is a myth.
I seek enlightenment. Tell me more.

neutral_response.text: Disrespect is the path of the ignorant. Leave this holy place before you defile it further.

hostile_response.text: Blasphemy! I will cleanse your soul with fire and steel!

positive_response.text: You wish to learn? The path is long and arduous, but the rewards are eternal. First, you must make a sacrifice.
